row.process:
:SET &command# = 'java -jar &$AGENT_RESOURCES_CLIENT#dm-tool.jar rm CreateProfile -u "&UC4RB_RM_HOST#" ' :SET &command# = STR_CAT(&command#,'-un "&UC4RB_RM_USERNAME#" -p "&UC4RB_RM_PASSWORD#" ') :SET &command# = STR_CAT(&command#,'-f "&UC4RB_RM_FOLDER#" -n "&UC4RB_RM_PROFILE_NAME#" ') :SET &command# = STR_CAT(&command#,'-e "&UC4RB_RM_ENV_ID#" -a "&UC4RB_RM_APP_ID#" ')
:IF &UC4RB_OWNER# <> "" : SET &command# = STR_CAT(&command#, '-o "&UC4RB_OWNER#" ') :ENDIF :IF &UC4RB_RM_LOGIN# <> "" : SET &command# = STR_CAT(&command#, '-l "&UC4RB_RM_LOGIN#" ') :ENDIF :IF &UC4RB_RM_FAIL_EXISTS# = "YES" : SET &command# = STR_CAT(&command#, '-fe') :ENDIF &command#
